tool.name: XLSToGDB

param.name: datasets_spreadsheet
param.dialogReference: The Excel spreadsheet with the dataset (table and feature class) schema details.
param.pythonReference: Path to the Excel spreadsheet with the dataset (table and feature class) schema details.

param.name: domains_spreadsheet
param.dialogReference: The Excel spreadsheet with the domains schema details.
param.pythonReference: Path to the Excel spreadsheet with the domains schema details.

param.name: relationships_spreadsheet
param.dialogReference: The Excel spreadsheet with the relationship class schema details.
param.pythonReference: Path to the Excel spreadsheet with the relationship class schema details.

param.name: gdb_path
param.dialogReference: The geodatabase in which the domains, tables, feature classes, and relationship classes will be created. The elements to be created must not already exist in the geodatabase.
param.pythonReference: Path to the geodatabase in which the domains, tables, feature classes, and relationship classes will be created. The elements to be created must not already exist in the geodatabase.

tool.summary: Create the geodatabase elements as read from a geodatabase schema in 3 Excel spreadsheets: datasets (tables, and feature classes), domains, and relationship classes.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Copyright Esri Canada 2024 Authors: David Blanchard, Roya Shourouni
